Tweet: I'm sitting next to a guy who keeps yelling (in reference to Pat Connaughton) "that boy can shoot!" He's a Lakers fan. Pat is shooting 31% from 3 this season. Perception is everything to fans.

WE NEED BETTER FROM MIDDLETON!!!! I shouldnt be more comfortable when Pat Connaughton t's up a open 3 than I am when Middleton does...HAS TO BE BETTER. But, not a bad start for the Bucks. Gotta settle in.
